Detailed Description

Motzkin-Burger algorithm for double-description of a polyhedral cone. The algorithm finds extreame rays and basis of cone Ax >= 0, where A is a matrix and x is a vector. Also the file contains an idle controller for this algorithm.

Definition in file motzkin_burger.hpp.
